pages.title: Trading with Hobgoblins
pages.text: Hobgoblins are friendly creatures often found in forested biomes in groups, especially nearby $(item)Hobgoblin Huts$() structures.$(2br)They are neutral, but will attack back if provoked.

pages.title: Hobgoblins and Villages
pages.description: Hobgoblins will raid and take over villages. When a village is nearby, they also tend to offer trades in a manner not too dissimilar from villager trading.

pages.title: Koboldite source
pages.description: Using a $(item)leat$() on a Hobgoblin will incline them to perform manual labor. When leashed, they will pick up dropped items and drop them into nearby chests.$(2br)Giving a Hobgoblin a pickaxe will make it begin mining. Occasionally, they can find $(item)Koboldite Dust$().
pages._comment: Unlocked when an hobgoblin gets a pickaxe thrown from a player

pages.title: Hobgoblin worshipping
pages.description: Hobgoblins worship their gods, $(item)Mog$() and $(item)Gulg$(). If a bound $(item)Statue of Hobgoblin Patron$() is nearby, they will begin worshipping it, recharging $(item)Infusion Power$() of the player the statue is bound to.$(2br)Worshipping Hobgoblins also increase the power of the $(item)Mystic Branch$() and its effects, but remember, if too many Hobgoblins worship the statue, Mog and Gulg will descend to slay the player.
pages._comment: Unlocked when a player crafts a Statue of Hobgoblin patron
